com.engineersbox.httpproxy.connection

Class ProxyConnectionAcceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engineersbox.httpproxy.connection.handler.BaseTrafficHandler
      • com.engineersbox.httpproxy.connection.ProxyConnectionAcceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ProxyConnectionAcceptor
extends BaseTrafficHandler
    Handles an accepted connection to a configured ServerSocket, to a server and client Socket instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProxyConnectionAcceptor(java.net.Socket localSocket, java.lang.String host, int port, ThreadManager poolManager) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void after() 
      void task()
      Submits BackwardTrafficHandler to handler pool of ThreadManager instance for client-to-server traffic and ForwardTrafficHandler to handler pool of ThreadManager instance for server-to-client traffic.
      ProxyConnectionAcceptor withSocketConfigs(Connections connectionsConfig)
      Supplies a configuration for Connections to use with Socket and InputStream/OutputStream instantiation

    • Method Detail

      • withSocketConfigs

        public ProxyConnectionAcceptor withSocketConfigs(Connections connectionsConfig)
        Supplies a configuration for Connections to use with Socket and InputStream/OutputStream instantiation
        Parameters:
        connectionsConfig - Configuration for Socket's and InputStream/OutputStream's via an instantiation of Connections
        Returns:
        Current instance of ProxyConnectionAcceptor with applied configs

      • task

        public void task()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Submits BackwardTrafficHandler to handler pool of ThreadManager instance for client-to-server traffic and ForwardTrafficHandler to handler pool of ThreadManager instance for server-to-client traffic.

        Handlers are created via a Injector using the Injector#getInstance(Class) method
        Specified by:
        task in class BaseTrafficHandler
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Upon any exceptions encountered during thread lifecycle

      • after

        public void after()
        Specified by:
        after in class BaseTrafficHandler
